description: The repository implementation depends on the EF Core database models being defined.
mitigation_plan: Tasks are sequential and handled by the same developer.
impact_if_delayed: Delays all subsequent backend and API tasks.

description: The CRUD API controller depends on the repository layer for data access.
mitigation_plan: Tasks are sequential and handled by the same developer.
impact_if_delayed: Delays all frontend UI development for CRUD.

description: The legacy migration script cannot be developed until the data mapping analysis is complete.
mitigation_plan: Start analysis early; use representative data sample.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire migration feature, a key deliverable for existing customers.
